system.description:
A large boulder begins rolling towards the party, threatening to crush them! The party must complete an 8-section normal difficulty clock in order to survive the ordeal before the trap's completes its 4-section clock.

If the party fails to complete the clock they must suffer one of the following consequences:

  • At the last moment your party finds a side passage that lets them avoid the boulder, but fall into a pit. Sometime later they find themselves outside the location.

  • One of your characters makes a desperate gamble in order to save the party but is defeated.
